webpage.full_text: How Do I Use a Condom? Designed by Sofia Cordoba Valencia, Senior Peer Health Advocate, 2023 e air, t o make spac e f o r v s o e m m e e R n Gently tear wrapper along Make sure condom is ready Place condom on while ridged edge to roll, with a “ring” outside pinching the tip After ejaculating, withdraw Roll condom down shaft, all penis while holding condom. the way to the base (balls) Roll off away from partner. External condoms may be used for vaginal, anal, or oral sex, as well as on sex toys or vibrators, to decrease the risk of sexually transmitted infections.
